# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its high-quality features and exceptional performance, it's truly a game-changer in its category. I believe you'll find immense value in it. Given its worth, I propose a price of $120 for this product. This offer includes a comprehensive warranty and 30-day satisfaction guarantee. Let me know if you have any questions or need further details. I look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
